dict.acceptation: 覆盖，遮蔽；采访，报导；涉及；包括；
盖子，覆盖物；（书等的）封面；隐蔽，遮蔽；（保险公司的）保险；

sent.orig: Press the cover lock release button and slide the cover latch down to open the cover.
sent.trans: 按压后盖锁定释放按钮，向下滑动后盖插锁，打开后盖。

sent.orig: NOTE: When you tighten cover in step 12, cover will engage the seat module properly.
sent.trans: 注意：在第12步骤紧固阀盖时，阀盖与阀座模块应该正确啮合。

sent.orig: What is the difference between current book cover design and past day book cover design?
sent.trans: 你觉得现在的书籍封面设计与过去相比有什么不同？

sent.orig: I read it from cover to cover in a single day.
After removing the cover screw, the check comes out with the cover.
sent.trans: 在拆卸阀盖螺丝后，止回模块将随同阀盖一起取出。
